name: VR Jet Fighter Simulator Real Virtual Reality Game
name_original: VR Jet Fighter Simulator Real Virtual Reality Game
description:
VR Jet Fighter Dogfight is offline hybrid vr flight simulation and VR action game in which you have to pilot jet fighter F-16 Falcon in storm of bullets and missiles in Virtual Reality.
VR Jet Fighter Simulation is based on realistic vr flight simulator where you have to pilot F-16 fighter jet thrusting in air towards the enemy fighter aircrafts. A vr game comprises of modern air combat using vr shooting skills. Fly your vr shooter gunship fighter jet through a storm of missiles and bullets against the best in the world through the sky. Enjoy excellent vr flight simulation of f16 falcon fighting air strike fighter with your vr headset.
Your worst enemy has attacked with army aircrafts on your borderline residential areas by false claiming surgical strikes. Now it’s time to chase and shoot down enemy Jet Fighters and defend the nation for freedom. Deploy Heat Seeking Missiles to make short work of your enemies, or get them in your iron sights and machine gun them out of the sky. Blazing Velocity. Control your speed, slow down to lock on enemies, or watch yourself go supersonic as you light up the after burn to pursue your competitors. Get revenge of your innocent people in jet fighter war.

VR Jet fighter simulation introduces two modes of gameplay. One mode works with Bluetooth controller along will all manual controls where user can experience air striking jet fighters action while second mode is a demo VR jet fighter simulator where user is allowed to enjoy spectacular view of fighter falcon following fighter aircrafts and shooting them automatically.
VR jet fighter simulation is dogfighting aerial battle with your enemy war planes, conducted at close range. An air strike fighter realistic virtual reality experience packed in intense aerial action, surrounded with jet engine noise and efficient gunshots, and lots of VR Jet Fighter playing fun!
How to Play:
- Take-off of Jet Fighter:
- Calibrate your device
- Use throttle lever to accelerate/decelerate the fighter jet (Up and Down)
- Use Brakes to reduce the speed or stop the jet
- Push landing gear leaver up to close the wheels
- Manual Mode works with Bluetooth controller
- Demo mode works automatically for awesome virtual reality experience
Dogfight:
- Control the direction of jet by tilt your device
- Avail Boost option to increase speed immediately
- Use Anti-Aircraft Machine gun, ballistic missiles to attack on opponent jet
fighters
- Perform barrel rolls to evade enemy fires
Landing of Fighter Jets:
- Push Landing gear down to open the jet’s wheels
- Reduce the speed as you can for landing
Game Features:
- Compatible with any of your VR headset
- Realistic 3D cockpit and controls
- Superb battlefields and air combat
- Missiles, bombs, machine guns and more
- Highly intuitive flying controls and compact user interface
- Realistic fighter airplanes crashes, explosions and smoke effects
- High quality world maps with real-time horizon
- Dynamic lighting and sound effects to recreate realistic experience
- Realistic planes flying physics
- Breathtaking battle scenarios
- Advanced Jet Fighter Fleets ready for intercept
- Realistic Jet Fighter flight simulation
